author: erikabele
msg: - remove one mirror due to only unrelated files (incl. p*rn)
- remove two german mirrors: 404 and connection refused (both notified)
- remove two US mirrors: 404 and hostname not found (both notified)
- add two new mirrors: CN and ES

author: leosimons
msg: All of pygump should use a stream abstraction instead of working on files directly if possible. Easy enough, and it allows, among other things, much better unit testing. Simply scan for 'open(' or 'file(' :-D

author: steveh
msg: Integrating alpha changes to current branch.
